title: Masquintense Thick by Kerastase for Unisex Hair Mask, 16.9 Ounce
description: Kerastase Nutritive Masquintense Thick #3 is a nutritive treatment for very dry, thick hair. Using Kerastase Gluco-Active Technology (Glucose + Protein + Lipids), Kerastase Masquintense Thick provides intense nourishment to soften thick, coarse hair.

title: The Balm In Stain Blush, Houndstooth Mauve, .3 Ounce
description: Shadow and blush 0.3 ounce the subtle shimmer catches the eye while the warm undertones provide a glow that is oh-so natural. A powder that works as both eye shadow and blush.

title: Godefroy 28 Day Mascara Permanent Eyelash and Eyebrow Tint Kit, Black
description: Buy Godefroy Mascaras - Godefroy 28 Day Mascara Permanent Eyelash and Eyebrow Tint Kit Black. How-to-Use: An allergy test is required 24 hours before use of this product. *For best results wash lashes thoroughly with mild soap. Let lashes dry before treatment. *Apply a thin layer of petroleum jelly around eye area. this will prevent staining and will adhere eye shield to skin. title: Miss Jessie's A Super Soft Styling Lotion Pillow Soft Curls 8.5 oz
description: The name says it all.  Miss Jessie's PILLOW SOFT CURLSTM is the new styling lotion that borrows fabric care technology and marries it to haircare. It is perfect for achieving static-free, big, soft, curly hair that we all dream about. If you don't want ramen noodle definition and instead want a larger, expanded, fluffy curl then PILLOW SOFT CURLSTM is for you! It's the first "fabric softener" type styling lotion that will leave your curls clothesline fresh and fluffy soft.  You will see that  PILLOW SOFT CURLSTM is so easy to apply. It spreads so smoothly and feels as light as a feather on your curls.
